GetFixedPurchaseWorkflowSettingCount.Statement: -- 全件数取得 SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_no), 0) AS row_count FROM w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting [[ FixedPurchaseWorkflow_SEARCH_WHERE ]]

GetFixedPurchaseWorkflowSettingList.Statement: -- 該当情報取得 SELECT w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.* FROM ( SELECT w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.shop_id, w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_kbn, w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_no, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( [[ FIXEDPURCHASEWORKFLOWSETTING_SEARCH_ORDER_BY ]] ) AS row_num FROM w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting [[ FixedPurchaseWorkflow_SEARCH_WHERE ]] ) AS RowIndex INNER JOIN w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting ON ( RowIndex.shop_id = w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.shop_id AND RowIndex.workflow_kbn = w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_kbn AND RowIndex.workflow_no = w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_no ) WHERE @bgn_row_num <= RowIndex.row_num AND RowIndex.row_num <= @end_row_num ORDER BY RowIndex.row_num ASC

GetFixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.Statement: SELECT w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.* FROM w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting WHERE w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_kbn = @workflow_kbn AND w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_no = @workflow_no

GetFixedPurchaseWorkflowSettingAllList.Statement: SELECT * FROM w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting WHERE w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_kbn = @workflow_kbn AND w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.valid_flg = '1' -- 有効 ORDER BY w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_kbn ASC, w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.display_order ASC

GetNewWorkflowNo.Statement: SELECT (COUNT(workflow_no) + 1) AS workflow_no FROM w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting WITH(XLOCK) WHERE w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_kbn = @workflow_kbn

DeleteFixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.Statement:
-- 削除 DELETE w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting WHERE w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_kbn = @workflow_kbn AND w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_no = @workflow_no
-- 枝番更新 UPDATE w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting SET w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_no = workflow_no - 1 WHERE w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_kbn = @workflow_kbn AND w2_FixedPurchaseWorkflowSetting.workflow_no > @workflow_no -- 削除対象の枝番より大きいレコード
